welcome_email_subject: Welcome to Accessed Talent! Your Journey Begins Here
welcome_email_body: Welcome to Accessed Talent! We are thrilled to have your company, {{companyName}}, join our platform. At Accessed Talent, we strive to connect top talent with leading companies. We look forward to seeing your success with us!
member_invitation_email_subject: Invitation to Join {{companyName}} on Accessed Talent
member_invitation_email_invitationMessag: You have been invited to join {{companyName}} on Accessed Talent as an HR member. Please click the link below to register and get started.
